title: Episode 228 - The Measure of an Emperor, Part 3
description: This week, we take a look at Hirohito's life before World War II. What kind of ruler was Japan's new emperor when the chips came down?
content:encoded: This week, we take a look at Hirohito's life before World War II. What kind of ruler was Japan's new emperor when the chips came down?
